DOC.brief_summary: This study do determine safety , biodistribution , radiation dosimetry 18F-DCFPyL , detect prostate cancer visual analysis .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Study 18F-DCFPyL , PSMA-based PET Radiotracer , Patients With Advanced Prostate Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: To assess hypothesis new 2nd generation positron emission tomography ( PET ) radiopharmaceutical , 18F-DCFPyL , may possess pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic property represent advance image metastatic prostate cancer ten patient diagnose metastatic prostate cancer .
DOC.criteria: Patients may enrol protocol follow inclusion criterion meet : 1 . Greater equal 18 year age 2 . Histological confirmation prostate cancer 3 . Radiologic evidence new progressive metastatic disease demonstrate anatomical imaging ( CT , MRI , ultrasound ) , bone scintigraphy , 18FSodium Fluoride PET , 18FFDG PET 4 . PSA ≥ 1.0 ng/mL 5 . Can androgen deprivation therapy dose stable ≥ 1 week . 6 . Platelet count > 50,000/mm3 7 . Neutrophil count > 1,000/mm3 8 . Patient judge Investigator initiative mean compliant protocol within geographical proximity make require study visit . 9 . Patients legal representative must ability read , understand provide write informed consent initiation study related procedure . Patients exclude enrollment follow apply : 1 . Karnovsky performance status < 60 2 . Inadequate venous access ( two antecubital equivalent venous access site require study drug injection PK blood sampling , respectively ) 3 . Patient receive permanent prostate brachytherapy implant within last 3 month ( Pd103 implant ) 12 month ( I125 implant ) 4 . Administered radioisotope within 5 physical halflives prior study enrollment 5 . Serum creatinine > 3 time upper limit normal 6 . Total bilirubin > 3 time upper limit normal 7 . Liver Transaminases > 5times upper limit normal 8 . Patient treat investigational drug , investigational biologic , investigational therapeutic device within 30 day prior study radiotracer administration 9 . Prior radiation therapy chemotherapy within 2 week prior study radiotracer administration ( Washout one halflife drug 2 week , whichever long ) . 10 . Prior history malignancy within 3 year , skin basal cell carcinoma .
